altText: Peel and finely slice the red onion. Add to bowl.
caption: Question 1: What is your favourite memory of the place you were born?

altText: Step 2: Remove the seeds of the chilli into the waste tub, & finely slice. Add to bowl.
caption: Question 2: What was your favourite meal ever, and why?

altText: Step 3: Roughly chop the tomatoes and mix with onion and chilli in a bowl.
caption: Question 3: What was the best thing that happened to you in the last week?

altText: Step 4: Step 4: Drain the chickpeas into the waste tub, mash about 10% of them & mix in.
caption: Question 4: What are you are looking forward to next week?

altText: Step 5: Chop the mint & rip the basil, add to bowl.
caption: Question 5: What are your strengths now, and is there one strength or skill you'd like to develop in the next year?

altText: Step 6: Squeeze the lemon juice into the bowl, along with 3 tbsp olive oil, and salt & pepper to taste.
caption: Question 6: In the next month, how will you use your strengths and start learning a new skill?

altText: Step 7: Place the bowlâ€™s contents onto serving dishes, and finish by crumbling the feta over the top. When the salad is ready, please take the bowls into the next room to share. While we wait, please can one pair clean the table while the rest of us wash and dry the kit to go back in the box for next time. Thanks!
caption: Question 7: In the next 2 weeks, would you like any help or encouragement using your strengths to develop new skills?

altText: Final Step: When everything is cleaned up and back in the box, you're ready to enjoy your meal / ride your bike etc).
caption: Thanks for leading the table assigned to you!
